title: Might as well start calling the game League of ADCS
body: the entire game revolves around them

replies.body:
Oh please, this is the only year/ season when adc's have shined. This game up until now has been revolving around assassins and survivability if anything.

aka tank assassins
{{champion:105}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:56}}  (before season 7)

ADCs have always been a dominant force in the meta.  They weren't always as overcentralized as they are now, but they've always been 100% mandatory on every team for a very long time.

It's been incredibly rare to see a team without at least an ADC in botlane ever since the double bruiser kill lanes died off sometime in season 2 or 3.
